mapper.select: SELECT /* com.work.workhub.member.message.model.dao.findMessageInbox() */ A.MSG_CODE , A.MSG_SENDER_NO , A.MSG_REICIPIENT_NO , A.MSG_CONTENT , A.MSG_SEND_DATE , A.MSG_SEND_TIME , A.MSG_READ_DATE , A.MSG_READ_TIME , A.MSG_RECYCLE_BIN_STATUS , A.MSG_DELETE_STATUS , B.NAME FROM MESSAGE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.MSG_SENDER_NO = B.NO) WHERE MSG_SENDER_NO = 303

SELECT /* com.work.workhub.member.message.model.dao.findMessageSent() */ A.MSG_CODE , A.MSG_SENDER_NO , A.MSG_REICIPIENT_NO , A.MSG_CONTENT , A.MSG_SEND_DATE , A.MSG_SEND_TIME , A.MSG_READ_DATE , A.MSG_READ_TIME , A.MSG_RECYCLE_BIN_STATUS , A.MSG_DELETE_STATUS , B.NAME FROM MESSAGE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.MSG_SENDER_NO = B.NO) WHERE A.MSG_REICIPIENT_NO = 303

SELECT /* com.work.workhub.member.message.model.dao.findMessageRecyclebinList() */ A.MSG_CODE , A.MSG_SENDER_NO , A.MSG_REICIPIENT_NO , A.MSG_CONTENT , A.MSG_SEND_DATE , A.MSG_SEND_TIME , A.MSG_READ_DATE , A.MSG_READ_TIME , A.MSG_RECYCLE_BIN_STATUS , A.MSG_DELETE_STATUS , B.NAME FROM MESSAGE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON(A.MSG_SENDER_NO = B.NO) WHERE A.MSG_REICIPIENT_NO = 303 AND A.MSG_RECYCLE_BIN_STATUS = 'Y'

INSERT /* com.work.workhub.member.message.model.dao.sendMessage(MessageDTO message) */ INTO MESSAGE ( MSG_CODE , MSG_SENDER_NO , MSG_REICIPIENT_NO , MSG_CONTENT , MSG_SEND_DATE , MSG_SEND_TIME , MSG_READ_DATE , MSG_READ_TIME , MSG_RECYCLE_BIN_STATUS , MSG_DELETE_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_MESSAGE_NO.NEXTVAL , 0 , 0 , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , 'N' , 'N' );
